629370.name: Runic Rampage - Soundtrack
629370.description:
Stay a while and listen.. If you love the music of Diablo® and Torchlight the Soundtrack of Runic Rampage is made for you!

The Soundtrack of Runic Rampage includes over 50 minutes of original music written by Alexander Eckhardt and Lukas Meinardus (Syndrone) in 320kbps MP3 format.

Tracklist


01 - Main Theme (1:35)
02 - Dusty Paths (5:35)
03 - The Desert Castle (5:07)
04 - Library of Stones (3:23)
05 - Forest of Thorns (5:52)
06 - Temple in the Woods (5:49)
07 - Magic Fountain (2:35)
08 - The Caves (5:17)
09 - Steamy Stronghold (4:46)
10 - Deepest Dungeon (3:24)
11 - Icy Abyss (5:40)
12 - Frozen Fortress (5:38)
13 - Tower of Terror (3:14)

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
